name: .ATC File Extension
summary: Learn about .ATC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Tool catalog file used by the AutoCAD design and documentation CAD software; contains definitions for all of the tools in a user interface palette; used for storing tool configurations and customizing the AutoCAD workspace.

content: AutoCAD creates an ATC file whenever the user defines a new palette on the interface.
NOTE: You can export a palette stored in an ATC file using an .XTP file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
